Last one is the future selections means you have to keep only the important features of data you have to remove the unnecessary features if your data is having then you have to remove it then we have also discussed about the how to handle the missing data and how we can scale the data we have seen these things in the previous classes and for stage 4 also we have seen that is model selection how we can select our model on the basis of our on the basis of our problems like what are the common models we have learnt that is linear regression which is used basically for the prediction of numbers.
